rules: Rule1: If the trench team discovers gold coins, then the excavation is not halted due to weather conditions
Rule2: Either the trench team discovers gold coins or the trench team finds an inscribed tablet
Rule3: If the epigrapher translates the ancient script, then the excavation is not halted due to weather conditions
Rule4: Provided that the team is equipped with ground penetrating radar, then if the trench team finds an inscribed tablet, the epigrapher translates the ancient script
Rule5: If the site violates preservation guidelines, then the agency suspends the excavation permit
Rule6: Either the team follows safety protocols or the site does not violate preservation guidelines
Rule7: If equipment damages a fragile artifact, then the artifact's structural integrity is compromised
Rule8: If equipment damages a fragile artifact, then the artifact's structural integrity is not compromised
Rule9: If the archaeologist documents the pottery shards, then the trench team discovered the pottery shards
Rule10: If the director contests the violation charges, then the university does not appeal the suspension decision
Rule11: Either the director contests the violation charges or the legal team negotiates a compliance agreement
Rule12: If the legal team negotiates a compliance agreement, then the university does not appeal the suspension decision
Rule13: If the trench team excavates a burial chamber, then the conservator analyzes textile fragments
Rule14: If the archaeologist catalogs artifacts, then the archaeologist documents the pottery shards
Rule15: If the lab technician preserves organic material, then the archaeologist catalogs artifacts
Rule16: If the conservator analyzes textile fragments, then the lab technician preserves organic material
Rule17: Either the director approves the excavation extension or the committee authorizes the excavation extension
Rule18: If the committee authorizes the excavation extension, then the excavation is completed on the scheduled timeline
Rule19: Should it not be the case that if the site violates preservation guidelines then the agency does not suspend the excavation permit, then the institution is not fined by the regulatory body

Rule20: Under the condition that it is not true that if the director approves the excavation extension then the excavation is completed on the scheduled timeline, then equipment damages a fragile artifact

Rule21: Under the condition that it is not true that if the director approves the excavation extension then the excavation is completed on the scheduled timeline, then the excavation is halted due to weather conditions

Rule22: Provided that it is not the case that should it not be the case that if the site violates preservation guidelines then the agency does not suspend the excavation permit then the institution is fined by the regulatory body, then the university appeals the suspension decision
Rule23: If the excavation is not completed on the scheduled timeline, then the site violates preservation guidelines
Rule24: If the excavation is not completed on the scheduled timeline, then the trench team excavates a burial chamber
Rule25: If the excavation is not completed on the scheduled timeline, then the trench team does not discover pottery shards
facts: Fact1: The team was equipped with ground penetrating radar
Fact2: The team did not follow safety protocols

question: The excavation was completed on the scheduled timeline
